flag.name: wxSP_3D
flag.description: Draws a 3D effect border and sash.

flag.name: wxSP_3DSASH
flag.description: Draws a 3D effect sash (part of default style).

flag.name: wxSP_NO_XP_THEME
flag.description: Under Windows XP, switches off the attempt to draw the splitter using Windows XP theming, so the borders and sash will take on the pre-XP look.

flag.name: wxSP_PERMIT_UNSPLIT
flag.description: Always allow to unsplit, even with the minimum pane size other than zero.

flag.name: wxSP_LIVE_UPDATE
flag.description: Don't draw XOR line but resize the child windows immediately.

string.name: orientation
string.description: Orientation of the splitter, either "vertical" or "horizontal" (default: horizontal).

float.name: gravity
float.description: Sash gravity, see wxSplitterWindow::SetSashGravity() (default: not set).

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_SPLITTER_SASH_POS_CHANGING
type.description: The sash position is in the process of being changed. May be used to modify the position of the tracking bar to properly reflect the position that would be set if the drag were to be completed at this point.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_SPLITTER_SASH_POS_CHANGED
type.description: The sash position was changed. May be used to modify the sash position before it is set, or to prevent the change from taking place

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_SPLITTER_UNSPLIT
type.description: The splitter has been just unsplit. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_SPLITTER_UNSPLIT event.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_SPLITTER_DOUBLECLICKED
type.description: The sash was double clicked. The default behaviour is to unsplit the window when this happens (unless the minimum pane size has been set to a value greater than zero).
